title: O-Day Semester 1
description: Time to kick off the new year! Come by our stall to see when your favourite events are happening, grab some merch and renew your membership.

title: BBQ On The Lawn 1 - (BOTL)
description: The sun is out and so should you be, It is time again for BBQ on The Lawn in 2026. Free snags, 50c Soft Drinks, Beers, Ciders, Premix Cans and Free Entry for members
